favourite.article: Lord, I am not discouraged because I believe in You! I am ye of little faith, but thank You that simple faith is all that's required from me. I love believing in You!

Lord, save me from dwelling in a place where there is no grace or supply...I'd like to believe in simple faith and enter into the realm of my mingled spirit! It is a releasing feeling of overwhelming peace when I learn to believe that everything in my life is something done by the union of God and man - not just what I see outwardly.
Thank You Lord for encouraging us always. All we need to do is just to believe in You and not to dwell and be bothered of what we see. Lord I love you.
Yes, I do believe! Though the world drags me down. But still I am not discouraged! Oh Lord I love believing You!
Thank You Lord, that in all our failures and defeats we need not to do anything and there is no demand from You just simple faith, believing for what You have done. I love You my dear Lord..
Lord, we love believing You!
Serving Him is the profession that we can attain. Although most of the times we fail but still He is there for us and only by believing Him we can overcome. Lord, cause me to enjoy more of You. :)
Simple faith.
Lord, I believe!
I think this is an a amazing song. Amen, I believe.
I love this song...
Live in faith. Be humble. Lord, You're so meek, faithful, beautiful and tender.

Truly, the living God is speaking to us through hymns. When I read the lyrics my spirit was revived, and my faith to the Lord was made even stronger than before..I felt the Lord moving within me. We praise Him.
I love this hymn! We sang it the week I got baptized.

I love this verse particularly: 1 Lord, now I see, You only want me to believe Not to change. In all my failures and defeats To believe what You have done, And not in what I see.
I think I've been focusing tooo much on trying to change some things about my life that I believe God wants me to do differently and not enough focusing on God Himself and all He has done. How awesome our God is that He just wants us to believe and enjoy him! O Lord my faith is so weak, help me to just believe and enjoy You. Forgive me for being so discouraged by my failures. Like Peter when he fell after walking on the water, I cry out to You to save me from the sea of depression , self-pity, anger and discouragement I have fallen into. Thank You Jesus that You are faithful. Amen. God is so good, He uses all kinds of ways to get our attention. He is worthy of all the praise. Amen!
Amen. :) Lord turn my heart and keep me always believing in You... In all my failures and defeats To BELIEVE what YOU HAVE DONE,and not in what I see.
It brought a lot of comfort during a time of suffering. It's comforting to know we can believe in Him and not on what we see around us.
I love this song!! Just believe! Does any one knows the name of this brother? Lord Jesus!!

Lord Jesus help my unbelieving heart to be simple and just to believe in You. Thank You Lord for encouraging us to just go on, not to dwell in our trials and defeat. Oh Lord Jesus. Brothers and sisters, we should go on. We should press on. Forget our defeats. We should stay in the church and praissssssssssseeeeeeeeeee the Lord! Hallelujah!

Lord now You let me see and believe that only You I should have believe. Even trials come into my way, I should have not discourage for You are my success. When I fail all I must do is just confess and go on enjoying You. Oh Lord Jesus I love believing You.
Every day we just need to come to Him and believe that everything He is. Nothing will defeat us because He is our success. "Lord, whatever may come keep my heart to just believe You. Amen."
Amen, I love believing You Lord Jesus and You are my success, not to be discouraged in all my failures and defeats, just simple faith.
Praise & Thank YOU LORD JESUS! In all my failures & defeats, all I must do is just confess, & continue enjoying You, & believing You.
Lord, I just love believing in You. There's no other one that I can believe into. Only You, Lord, only You.

Praise the Lord. I'm in school today and I feel so down. I don't know but my spirit seems to be shouting at me, yelling that it needs some water. I opened Youtube and try to see some yp songs. I would like to hear some new songs and when I sing along with this hymn, Oh Lord Jesus, there is the flowing within. AMEN!

When I first heard this song, in a meeting, I was very touched because earlier that day I was struggling to come to the meeting hall. Many things happened that day, failures in projects and everything related to school just keeps on failing. Even when I was on my way to the meeting hall, it's as if Satan is just fond of keeping me away from it. But inside me, there was Someone speaking that I need to drink because my spirit is athirst. I don't know, when I enterd the meeting hall, this was the hymn. And I was touched by the message. And many more hymns I heard that is as if the Lord is talking to me through them. Praise His name now and forevermore!

Before, as a young people, I like to sing this song because I like the tune but I didn't appreciate the content that much. But right now, the Lord brought me into a situation where I did experienced all that was included in this song and now I appreciate it and I love the Lord more! I love believing Him!
Lord, now I see, You only want me to believe. I always believing on You no matter what I experience for...

Lord, thank You for such a wonderful things You have done for me. Lord, You are my success for all my failure and defeats. Lord, thank You for always guiding me for all the things which I need to do. Lord, I love You. No one can compare to You.
LORD I BELIEVE! Because Lord You are my success! Simple faith, yes, that is all You want from me. FREED from anxious doubting - I'm free to just believe!!

Lord now I see that with all my failures and defeats all I must do is just confess and believe what You have done and go on enjoying You. Hallelujah! What a wonderful love God brought to us. Lord keep our heart to love You more and more each day. I LOVE YOU LORD! Nothing can compares Your love to us. Amen!
Lord, preserve my heart in believing You and enjoying You!!!
I love the Lord with all my heart and no matter what once you believe He never forgets you."In all my failures and defeats" He will never give up on me. Amen.
This hymn makes me feel safe. Christ saves me from everything in the world and Christ is my only peace!
Believing is receiving. To receive is to be open with willing heart. Lord, keep me so simple and just believe in You.
LORD I BELIEVE/EU CREIO!
Lord may You reveal Yourself to me. Lord now I see that this is what You want, that we believe in You and love only You, I love You Lord with all my heart and with all my soul.
Lord, just be my focus~~I love believing in You~~
Lord, I love believing in You because You are my success!!!
Lord, Thank You for You are my success and my All in All! No more anxious doubting, Lord..... I believe!
Simple faith, yes, that is all You want from me. Lord, may I seek You face to face, seeing You and You alone.
Yes! I believe Lord.
Lord, thank You for letting me see this vision. Now I see, You only want me to believe in You and be freed from anxious doubting. I have faith and just believing in You, Lord. You're my real success.
Lord! grant me open eyes to see You and have simple faith in You.
I sing this song whenever I can. It has been my favorite since I was little. Amen! Lord thank You for being my success! Lord, You just want me to believe. Bless the saints and be their supply.
Lord, I believe in You. Just grant me the vision that I can see Your grace and riches. May I enjoy You everyday!!!!
Every circumstances becomes smooth by believing in the Lord. Hallelujah!!!!
I really like this song because it is an encouragement to us that the Lord's desire is for us to be free from anxious doubting. Lord, I believe in You because You are my success!
It is through our faith that we believe all the things that God has given us, either big or small.
Sometimes it's hard not to "believe in" what we see, but at we have assurance that we that we could believe in what He has done... and He has done so much.
